message: Rule applicable: div_to_bubble ([("Bubble", 6000)]), to expression: UnsafeDiv(x, y), resulting in: {SafeDiv(x, y) @ (y != 0)}
Rule applicable: bubble_up ([("Bubble", 8900)]), to expression: ({SafeDiv(x, y) @ (y != 0)} = z), resulting in: {(SafeDiv(x, y) = z) @ And([(y != 0)])}
Rule applicable: expand_bubble ([("Bubble", 8900)]), to expression: {(SafeDiv(x, y) = z) @ And([(y != 0)])}, resulting in: And([(SafeDiv(x, y) = z), And([(y != 0)])])
Rule applicable: introduce_diveq ([("Minion", 4200)]), to expression: (SafeDiv(x, y) = z), resulting in: DivEq(x, y, z)
Rule applicable: remove_unit_vector_and ([("Base", 8800)]), to expression: And([(y != 0)]), resulting in: (y != 0)
